commits.author: Steven Rowe
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Loads a new {@link Source} instance for this {@link DocValues} field * instance. Source instances returned from this method are not cached. It is * the callers responsibility to maintain the instance and release its * resources once the source is not needed anymore. *

* For managed {@link Source} instances see {@link #getSource()}. * * @see #getSource() * @see #setCache(SourceCache) */ public abstract Source load() throws IOException;

* For managed {@link Source} instances see {@link #getSource()}. * * @see #getSource() * @see #setCache(SourceCache) */ public abstract Source load() throws IOException;
